Synonyms.Synonym: Human chorionic gonadotropin blood test - quantitative

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about HCG blood test - quantitative
QAPair.Answer: A quantitative human chorionic gonadotropin (HCG or hCG) blood test measures the specific level of HCG in the blood. HCG is a hormone produced in the body during pregnancy. Other HCG tests include: HCG urine test , HCG blood test -- qualitative ,
